extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerHandler

      public ControllerHandler​(GameBoard g, VirtualView v, Controller c)
      Constructor to set ControllerHandler
      Parameters:
      g - gameBoard
      v - virtualView
      c - controller

  • Method Details

    • controlInit

      public void controlInit()
      Update method used to handle game initialization. It checks user Choice. If all Choice's attributes are null no choice is done and creationGame is invoked. If a user choice was done it will set the initial position of the workers.

    • controlMove

      public void controlMove()
      Update method to call model's method that modifies the state of the worker selected, checking user Choice.

    • controlBuild

      public void controlBuild()
      Update method to call model's method that modifies the state of the building selected, checking user Choice.

    • controlCurrentPlayer

      public java.lang.String controlCurrentPlayer()
      Update method that takes the 2 player's workers and checks if player has lost due to opponents' turn. If the player has not lost the method returns his nickname. If the current player is the only one remained on the board he directly wins the Game.
      Returns:
      nickname of the Player

    • controlEnd

      public void controlEnd()
      Update method to set new current player checking the arraylist of the gameBoard. The new currentPlayer value will be the next of the new turn only if the Player has not lost yet.

    • controlNextState

      public void controlNextState​(java.lang.String s)
      Update method to update the new game Phase. It checks, after every phase, if the player has lost or has won. In this cases the game Phase will be set at the END of turn. If the player wins, the View's GameDone value will be set true.
      Parameters:
      s - string that identify the next game Phase

    • controlWhatToDo

      public java.lang.String[][] controlWhatToDo()
      Update method to obtain all the possible actions during a turn. These actions are contained in every Card.
      Returns:
      matrix of strings that contains all possible actions during the turn

    • controlStart

      public void controlStart​(java.lang.Integer choice)
      Update method to choose the right worker only if it is available during the starting phase of turn.
      Parameters:
      choice - worker id choose by player

    • controlEffect

      public void controlEffect()
      Update method used to communicate to View to Print an effect that was applied.

    • controlUndoPower

      public void controlUndoPower​(Worker worker, java.lang.String previousPhase)
      Method to call all undoAction referred to previousPhase for the worker selected.
      Parameters:
      worker - worker of the current turn
      previousPhase - previous game phase

    • getPreviousGamePhase

      public java.lang.String getPreviousGamePhase()
      Utility method to know which was the previous Phase turn.
      Returns:
      previousPhase

    • pickCards

      public java.lang.String[] pickCards​(int numPlayers)
      Method to pick a random set of cards.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players
      Returns:
      randomPick which length is equal to numPlayers
